title: S2 Ep45: How to improve consumer credit ratings
itunes:title: How to improve consumer credit ratings
description: Doing a good job of deciding who can borrow is fundamental for the global economy. Stefania Albanesi tells Tim Phillips that current consumer credit ratings do a poor job at predicting which of us will default, and explains how she has used machine learning to improve them.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
